title: Remember back in the glory days of Season 2...
body: When ADCs had to position correctly and kite or get instantly killed. You know back when they took {{summoner:14}}  and not {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:21}}  every game. I miss those days...

replies.body: remember when kids played outside and not on these devil machines?
What's Outside? Is that an older app?
yeah, right now some ADCs can just facetank and rambo into teams, survive and end up with pentakills thanks to the 4 support peel for 1 adc team comp.
I miss them, but the few times I played on the other side as an ADC...not fun. Oh, Olaf is building pure tank...can't even escape him because shooting him means I'm slowed, well...GG.
